A dog leash that changes color based on the dog's mood or energy level. This would allow owners to better understand their dog's emotional state and adjust their training accordingly.
A dog leash with built-in GPS tracking, so owners can easily locate their dog if they get lost.
A dog leash with a built-in camera, so owners can capture memories of their dog's adventures and playtime.
A dog leash with a built-in speaker, so owners can play music or audiobooks for their dog to enjoy during walks.
A dog leash with a built-in water bottle, so owners can easily give their dog water on the go.
